conbody.p: Behavior-driven development (BDD) is enabled in Katalon Studio. From Katalon Studio version 7.8.0, you can integrate BDD-enabled projects with Katalon TestOps. By doing so, you can see native BDD Test Results with their Features and Scenarios.

li.p: You have a BDD Project in Katalon Studio. See: BDD Testing Framework (Cucumber integration).
You have enabled Katalon TestOps integration in Katalon Studio. See: Upload Test Results to Katalon TestOps from Katalon Studio.
